item.title: Trump’s Iran threats face ‘Obama red line’ test as White House pivots to diplomacy
item.description: Trump threatens Iran with military action while pursuing diplomatic talks. Recent drone shootdowns escalate tensions as diplomatic summit approaches.

item.title: Homan announces drawdown of federal presence in Minnesota, hails 'unprecedented cooperation' from local police
